message:
Another fruitful round of campaigning in Assam. Happy to see the strong support for BJP. Assam reposed faith in Congress for 15 years but all they got was betrayal. Sadly, Assam has not received the development it deserves.

BJP's focus on development, development & development will ensure the youngsters get jobs, farms get water, corruption is fully eliminated.

Highlighted why BJP is the best party to mitigate challenges & give wings to aspirations of people in Barak Valley. http://nm-4.com/3v7j
